question: 化かす
sourceMnemonic:
You've seen the word <ja>化ける</ja> (to transform) before. Now we have a similar word. This word means <vocabulary>to bewitch</vocabulary> because when you cuss (<ja>かす</ja>) you are saying a magic word and bewitching the person in front of you. Imagine yourself yelling out cuss words, and every time a new enchantment falls upon your victim.

This verb is transitive, meaning it takes a direct object. You bewitch someone or something.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>化ける</ja>, so make sure you know that word and you'll be able to learn this word's reading as well.
